name: Cute animals and Heavy guns
description:
"Cute Animals and Heavy Guns" is an exhilarating arena shooter game that immerses you in a world where adorable animals must battle through a zombie apocalypse. As a player, you assume the role of these cute creatures and must assemble a formidable arsenal of weapons to fend off relentless waves of enemies. But don't let the cuteness fool you – these animals mean business!


Your mission is to survive and eliminate hordes of zombies by strategically planning your moves and executing swift retreats when necessary. The game offers a vast array of weaponry, allowing you to wield as much power as you can handle. From pistols to shotguns, assault rifles to rocket launchers, you have access to unique and devastating firearms that will aid you in your fight for survival.


Features
  • Adorable Animals: Take control of cute and lovable animals as you navigate through the zombie apocalypse. Play as fluffy bunnies, fierce felines, or other charming creatures, each with their own unique abilities and traits.
  • Heavy Arsenal: Arm yourself with an impressive selection of 25 different weapons, ranging from pistols to rocket launchers. Unleash devastating firepower on the hordes of zombies and experiment with various combinations to find your perfect loadout.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Survive by carefully planning your moves and retreats. Make split-second decisions to avoid being overwhelmed by the relentless waves of undead. Strategic thinking and quick reflexes are essential for survival.
  • Diverse Locations: Explore four distinct and immersive locations, each with its own challenges and opportunities. From urban streets to desolate wilderness, adapt your tactics to the environment and use it to your advantage.
  • Endless Arena Mode: Test your skills and endurance in the endless arena mode. Face increasingly challenging waves of zombies and strive for the highest score. How long can you survive against the unending onslaught of the undead?
